caption.center: James Lumas BELL v. S.A. BECK et ux.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Hinds County; James Arden Barnett, Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
Leon L. Shelton, Jackson, for appellant.
Barnett, Montgomery, McClintock Cunningham, Ross R. Barnett, Jr., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before GILLESPIE, C.J., and PATTERSON, INZER, SUGG and WALKER, JJ.
